ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Here i go again :-P
ygData.msgSnippet: This is exactly what happened to me.  i had asked if anyone could help a young druid stand a fighting chance on her own...i was meaning just buffs...along came
ygData.messageBody:
This is exactly what happened to me. i had asked if
anyone could help a young druid stand a fighting
chance on her own...i was meaning just buffs...along
came this WONDERFUL person who suited me with some
basic leather armor and gave me 50pp to boot to help
buy my spells...i was amazed!!! He said he was
fulfilling a promise...i will be glad to one day have
the opportunity to give back to another who is just
starting out...What is it they say..."Pay It
Forward"??

**hugs**
Amaiya, Fennin Ro Druid, Loyal to Tunare

--- Su <suceress@...> wrote:
> Heh. Yeah. I've found that being friendly with
> people is profitable. I don't
> do it for money, I like to be nice and joke with
> people. The other day some
> guy gave me 100pp just for emoting something.
> And high lvl druids have been nice to my druid. One
> walked up and gave her a
> bunch of armor, a Forest Loop, and a wraithbone
> hammer!
> Very sweet of him.
> luv,
> -Su
